txt.en: As you describe to Gwynna the state of the Quick Post service in the Shire, your feet ache with the memory of running those mail satchels from village to village. Gwynna is especially surprised by your account of the numerous nosey hobbits you found it necessary to avoid. 'They just came right up and bothered you? Did they not realize your honour was at stake?' he asks. You respond that they just wanted to know the news.
